desc:3451324296: Enemies damaged by your Overlord have their souls cloven, increasing damage taken by you and your pets by {1}% for {2} sec.
desc:839143379:
Demonic Art increases the damage of your next Chaos Bolt, Rain of Fire, or Shadowburn by {1}% and reduces its cast time by {2}%.

Casting Chaos Bolt reduces the duration of Diabolic Ritual by {3} additional sec.
desc:1834258261: Agony, Corruption, Unstable Affliction, Seed of Corruption, and Shadow Bolt deal up to {1}% increased damage on targets below {2}% health. Damage increase is higher against lower health targets.
desc:4203076518:
Wither damage increased by {1}%.

Blackened Soul deals {2}% increased damage per stack of Wither.
desc:334300076: Increases the damage done by your Fire spells by {1}% and reduces the cast time of your Incinerate spell by {2}%.
desc:1487602528: Targets resurrected with Soulstone resurrect with {1}% additional health and {2}% additional mana.
desc:847038111: Your Soul Shards now float above your head.
desc:2938894264: Your Soul Shards have been touched by fel energy.
desc:1942391269: Casting Unstable Affliction or Seed of Corruption reduces the cooldown of Dark Harvest by {1} sec.
desc:263706401:
Dark magic erupts from you and corrupts your soul for {1} sec, causing enemies suffering from your Wither to take {2} Shadowflame damage and increase its stack count by {3}.

While corrupted your Haste is increased by {4}% and spending Soul Shards on damaging spells grants {5} additional stack of Wither.
desc:3575166801: Corrupts the target, causing {1} Shadow damage and an additional {2} Shadow damage over {3} sec.
desc:1373142373: Howl of Terror cooldown is reduced by {1} sec and range is increased by {2} yds.
desc:4284719557: Rain of Fire has a {1}% chance to reduce the cost of your next Rain of Fire within {2} sec by {3}%.
desc:4550585: Malevolence grants an additional {1}% Haste and when cast increases the stack count of active Withers by an additional {2} stacks.
desc:4025558461:
Call forth a cloud of cloying shadow mist that envelopes the target and all enemies within {1} yds, increasing their casting time of all spells by {2}% for {3} sec.

desc:3597690575:
Call forth a cloud of cloying shadow mist that envelopes the target and all enemies within {1} yds, increasing the time between their attacks by {2}% and reducing their critical strike chance by {3}% for {4} sec.

desc:2093205244: The fangs of your Dreadstalkers are coated in corrosive bile, causing Dreadbite to deal additional damage equal to {1}% of damage dealt as Plague damage.
desc:80701395: Your Healthstones are replaced with Bloodstones which increase their user's haste by {1}% for {2} sec instead of healing.
desc:3443575152: Casting Unstable Affliction on a target affected by your Unstable Affliction increases your Haste by {1}% for {2} sec.
desc:3295036944: Increases Chaos Bolt damage by {1}% and Chaos Bolt now has a {2}% chance to make your next Incinerate instant.
desc:335340882:

Incinerate has a {3}% chance to fire a Demonfire bolt at {4}% increased effectiveness.
desc:4007791760: Increases how quickly Rain of Fire deals damage by {1}% and how quickly your Infernal's Immolation deals damage by {2}%.
desc:4292678532: Periodic damage dealt by Wither has a chance to grant Malevolence for {1} sec.
desc:516283011:
You summon a Diabolic Oculus, up to {1}, each time the duration of Diabolic Ritual is reduced by one of your spells.

Diabolic Oculi explode when consuming Demonic Art, dealing {2} Fire damage to all enemies within {3} yds of the target. Damage reduced beyond {4} targets.
desc:2244687508: Increases damage dealt by Hand of Gul'dan to its main target by {1}%.
desc:1240074737: Summoning your Demonic Tyrant leaves open a portal to Argus for {1} sec, causing every {2} casts of Hand of Gul'dan to summon a subjugated demon that serves you for {3} sec.
desc:3185576274:
While Dominion of Argus is active, Hand of Gul'dan refunds {1} [plural|Soul Shard|Soul Shards].

Demons summoned by Dominion of Argus last an additional {2} sec.
desc:3818567412: Increases the duration of Dominion of Argus by {1} sec and increases damage dealt by Hand of Gul'dan by {2}%.
desc:840052276:

desc:2446915475: Memories of the Titans' destruction flash in your mind when you evoke the Dark Titan's power, increasing critical strike by {1}% and haste by {2}% for {3} sec.
desc:4111402018:

desc:3282172600: Drain Life heals for an additional {1}% of damage dealt and grants Soul Leech equal to {2}% of damage dealt.

desc:3149947256: Reduces the cast time of Demonic Gateway by {1} sec and you can now use Demonic Gateways twice before triggering a cooldown.
